title: Bronze team
body:
Heya, still kinda new to bronze but i thought it would be better if i could have a consistent team that could work together in getting better. I want this to be chill so no prerequisite, except maybe skype. add me Alien1521 
Thanks guys

replies.body: still looking only have 2 in the team atm maybe three :)
can i join i can fill add me Ninja678
I am B4 and would love to join a 5v5 team :D

Hit me up I would be keen. I am getting sick of solo bronze que. I always end up getting out of B5, do good in B4 and end back in B5 again because of the constant AFKers and KSers. Need a change of pace. I play mid, adc and top. I am also learning to jungle and can kinda supp. I also know someone else who is in either B1 or B2 who may be interested who mains Supp, his summoner name is Melchior119 I think, mine is RebirthKnight. Hopefully I see you around...
Oh sweet, positions don't really bother me, cause we can always try something new. Add me and hopefully we can get one more
I can main support and I can jungle too Bronze 3
